import React from 'react' import i18next from "i18next"; import {useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import styles from './Features.module.scss' const Features = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (

{t('features_title')}

{t('main_mentor')}

{t('features_subtitle1')}

{t('main_trening')}

{t('features_subtitle2')}

{t('main_video')}

{t('features_subtitle3')}

ОНЛАЙН {t('main_shop')}

{t('features_subtitle4')}

) } export default Features
